verses.roman:
e saba vṛttānta śuni' mahārāṣṭrīya brāhmaṇa
prabhure kahite sukhe karilā gamana

synonyms: e saba vṛttānta—all these descriptions; śuni'-hearing; mahārāṣṭrīya brāhmaṇa—the Mahārāṣṭrian brāhmaṇa; prabhure—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kahite—to inform; sukhe—very happily; karilā gamana—went.
translation: After hearing all these statements, the Mahārāṣṭrian brāhmaṇa very jubilantly went to inform Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
